summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5948 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 22, North Seattle Addition, being the alley between 1st Avenue West and Queen Anne Avenue, from West Harrison Street to West Republican Street; and certain other alleys, streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 79205, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
